title: ‘Permacrisis’ is a dictionary’s word of the year in ‘truly awful’ 2022
description: The U.K.-based Collins's Dictionary names "permacrisis,” an extended period of instability, as its word of the year amid the Ukraine war and rising inflation.

title: ‘Saturnalia’ is a morbid jigsaw puzzle that’s more clever than scary
description: "Saturnalia," released Oct. 27, is stylish — but let down by its survival horror elements.

title: MAGA porn, hate for Trump: China-based accounts stoke division
description: Twitter disrupted three separate China-based operations that were seeking to influence U.S. politics ahead of the 2022 midterms.

title: Musk mulls Twitter verification charge, barters with Stephen King on fee
description: "We need to pay the bills somehow," Elon Musk tweeted after reports Twitter was considering a $20 charge for people to keep their coveted blue checks.

title: Twitter wants to charge for verification. Here’s what you need to know.
description: Elon Musk wants to charge Twitter users for verification. Here's what that means for people who have the blue checkmark, and those who want it.
